Welcome to ISSS624 AY2023!

This page documents my learning journey of geospatial analytics.

Mac User Journey

1.  install.packages("httr2")

2.  Set up git by typing usethis::use_git() in console. When prompted "*Is it ok to commit them?* ", selection "*Not now*". You will observe an icon GI+ appeared in toolbar menu.

3.  Create a github token.

    a\) install.packages(c("gh", "gitcreds"))

    b\) usethis::create_github_token()

    c\) gitcreds::gitcreds_set() and enter your token

    d\) gh::gh_whoami()

4.  Set up new github repository for the project by typing usethis::use_github() in console.

5.  Publish webpage through Netlify: https://www.netlify.com.

    a\) Sign up through Github account.

    b\) Add a new site and indicate \_site in *Publish directory*.

    c\) Deploy site.
